name: c-cpp-flylint
description: An advanced, modern, static analysis extension for C/C++ that supports a number of back-end analyzer programs.

scripts.compile: npm run compile:server && npm run compile:client
scripts.compile:server: cd server && npm run compile && cd ..
scripts.vscode:prepublish: npm run compile:server && npm run compile:client

commands.title: C/C++ Flylint: Analyze the active document
C/C++ Flylint: Analyze all documents opened in the workspace

c-cpp-flylint.debug.description: Enable or disable verbose debug logging

c-cpp-flylint.run.description: Run the linter upon typing (onType), when possible, or on save (onSave).

c-cpp-flylint.ignoreParseErrors.description: Ignore when the extension can't parse a line of the linter.

c-cpp-flylint.excludeFromWorkspacePaths.description: A list of paths within the workspace for which no analyses/diagnostics will be displayed.

c-cpp-flylint.language.description: Force to check all files as the given language. Cascades to all analyzers unless overridden in one or more analyzers.

c-cpp-flylint.standard.description: The language standards to check against. Cascades to all analyzers unless overridden in one or more analyzers.

c-cpp-flylint.defines.description: Preprocessor symbols to define. Cascades to all analyzers unless overridden in one or more analyzers.

c-cpp-flylint.undefines.description: Preprocessor symbols to undefine. Cascades to all analyzers unless overridden in one or more analyzers.

c-cpp-flylint.includePaths.description: Paths to search for include files. They may be relative or absolute. Cascades to all analyzers unless overridden in one or more analyzers.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.enable.description: Enable or disable the Clang linter

c-cpp-flylint.clang.executable.description: This option allows you to override the executable called when using Clang

c-cpp-flylint.clang.configFile.description: A .clang_complete file to use/fallback to if no config file is found in the current project

c-cpp-flylint.clang.includePaths.description: Paths to search for include files. They may be relative or absolute.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.standard.description: The language standards to check against. For example, one or more of: posix, c89, c99, c11, c17, c18, c++03, c++11, c++14, c++17, c++20.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.language.description: Force Clang to check all files as the given language.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.extraArgs.description: Extra verbatim command-line arguments to include on the Clang command-line invocation.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.warnings.description: Warnings to include in the analysis. Default is everything possible.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.includes.description: An array of files to directly include with every processed file. Operates via utilizing Clang's -include parameter.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.standardLibs.description: The standard libraries to utilize. Operates via utilizing Clang's -stdlib parameter. Some macOS and BSD systems need to use a special library for C++11 support.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.pedantic.description: Enable or disable the -pedantic command-line argument to Clang.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.pedanticErrors.description: Enable or disable the -pedantic-errors command-line argument to Clang.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.msExtensions.description: Enable or disable the -fms-extensions command-line argument to Clang.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.noExceptions.description: Enable or disable the -fno-exceptions command-line argument to Clang.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.noRtti.description: Enable or disable the -fno-rtti command-line argument to Clang.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.blocks.description: Enable or disable the -fblocks command-line argument to Clang.

c-cpp-flylint.clang.severityLevels.description: Maps the severity levels of Clang to VSCode severity levels (Error, Warning, Information, Hint). Setting to 'None' will not show the severity type at all.

fatal.description: Used when very major issues are found.

error.description: Used when major issues are found.

warning.description: Suggestions about defensive programming to prevent potential issues.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.enable.description: Enable or disable the CppCheck linter

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.executable.description: This option allows you to override the executable called when using CppCheck

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.extraArgs.description: Extra verbatim command-line arguments to include on the cppcheck command-line invocation.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.configFile.description: A .clang_complete file to use/fallback to if no config file is found in the current project

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.includePaths.description: Paths to search for include files. They may be relative or absolute.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.platform.description: The platform used for types and sizes.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.standard.description: The language standards to check against. Can be one or more of: posix, c89, c99, c11, c17, c18, c++03, c++11, c++14, c++17, c++20.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.suppressions.description: Warnings to suppress. Refer to the CppCheck documentation for what to supply here.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.addons.description: Addons to use with cppcheck. For example, misra, cert, etc. Refer to the CppCheck documentation for what to supply here.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.verbose.description: Whether to enable verbose output from CppCheck.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.language.description: Force CppCheck to check all files as the given language.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.inconclusive.description: Allow reporting even though analysis is inconclusive. May lead to false positives.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.force.description: Controls whether CppCheck enumerates all possible configurations.

c-cpp-flylint.cppcheck.severityLevels.description: Maps the severity levels of CppCheck to VSCode severity levels (Error, Warning, Information, Hint). Setting to 'None' will not show the severity type at all.

error.description: Used when major issues are found.

warning.description: Suggestions about defensive programming to prevent potential issues.

style.description: Stylistic issues related to code cleanup such as unused functions, redundant code, constness, etc.

performance.description: Suggestions for making the code faster. These suggestions only and may not increase execution speed.

information.description: Minor issues that do not fit into other categories.

c-cpp-flylint.flexelint.enable.description: Enable or disable the Flexelint linter

c-cpp-flylint.flexelint.executable.description: This option allows you to override the executable called when using Flexelint

c-cpp-flylint.flexelint.configFile.description: A .flexelint.rc file to use/fallback to if no config file is found in the current project

c-cpp-flylint.flexelint.headerArgs.description: A list of arguments passed to Flexelint when scanning header source files

c-cpp-flylint.flexelint.severityLevels.description: Maps the severity levels of Flexelint to VSCode severity levels (Error, Warning, Information, Hint). Setting to 'None' will not show the severity type at all.

Error.description: Used when major issues are found.

Warning.description: Suggestions about defensive programming to prevent potential issues.

c-cpp-flylint.pclintplus.enable.description: Enable or disable the PC-lint Plus linter

c-cpp-flylint.pclintplus.executable.description: This option allows you to override the executable called when using PC-lint Plus

c-cpp-flylint.pclintplus.configFile.description: A PC-lint Plus file to use/fallback to if no config file is found in the current project

c-cpp-flylint.pclintplus.headerArgs.description: A list of arguments passed to PC-lint Plus when scanning header source files

c-cpp-flylint.pclintplus.severityLevels.description: Maps the severity levels of PC-lint Plus to VSCode severity levels (Error, Warning, Information, Hint). Setting to 'None' will not show the severity type at all.

error.description: Used when major issues are found.

warning.description: Suggestions about defensive programming to prevent potential issues.
